name: Reunion Family File
summary: Learn about .FAMILYFILE files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Reunion family files save information such as birth and death dates, occupations, religions, notes, facts, events, and tags.

description: Family tree file created by Reunion, a genealogy application for Mac OS X and iOS (iPhone and iPad); stores a family tree of persons and their ancestors; used for tracking, browsing, and printing ancestries.
